name: wrappy bird
description:
a flappy bird clone, where not only do the pipes go really fast, but you can also wrap around the screen by falling out or up of the world. it's not really useful at all, except in some cases where you can do EPIC TRICKSHOTS!

controls: click to flap and also to start. you can also press space but my dumbass forgot to change the code, resulting in it giving you a teeny tiny hop instead of an actual flap.
also the music was made by me in like 15 minutes (sampling kevin macleod, obviously)
